articles.title: Nerve Disorder Listed As 'Very Rare' Side Effect Of AstraZeneca Vaccine - News18
articles.description: The European Medicines Agency has listed the neurological disorder Guillain-Barre syndrome, which can cause temporary paralysis, as a "very rare" side effect of the AstraZeneca Covid-19 vaccine.
